items.name: AI-and-Data-Analytics
items.description: A comprehensive data analytics project showcasing Python-based data processing and machine learning techniques. Features include data visualization, statistical analysis, and predictive modeling using Jupyter notebooks.

items.name: git fundamentals
items.description: A learning project focused on Git and GitHub fundamentals, demonstrating version control best practices, branching strategies, and collaborative development workflows.

items.name: Tweeter page clone
items.description: A Twitter page clone built with modern web technologies, featuring responsive design, user interface replication, and interactive components that mimic the original Twitter experience.

items.name: conference_project
items.description: A comprehensive conference management application designed to handle event planning, attendee registration, and conference logistics. Features include user management, scheduling, and administrative tools.

items.name: Website design
items.description: A portfolio of projects developed during the AmaliTech coding bootcamp, showcasing HTML and CSS skills with practical web development applications and responsive design principles.
